body.name: Logitech C920e HD 1080p Mic-Disabled, certified for Zoom and Microsoft Teams, TAA Compliant

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: SUPPORT WORK FROM ANYWHERE WITH SYNC: Whether employees are in the office, at home, or somewhere else, Sync device management software helps everyone stay connected by letting you ensure their Logitech video collaboration personal devices are being used and up to date.
With a 78° fixed field of view, the C920e webcam displays individual users in a well-balanced frame, while also providing sufficient room to visually share projects and other items of interest.
C920e includes dual integrated omnidirectional mics that are optimized to capture your audio from up to one meter away, so conversations always sound natural and clear.
Built-in HD autofocus ensures you’re seen clearly throughout your video calls. With automatic light correction, C920e delivers optics that help you look good in all your video meetings.
The C920e webcam features an attachable privacy screen that flips up and down to cover or expose the lens. A simple glance at the cover confirms if the lens is able to see into your space or not.

The C920e webcam is certified for Microsoft Teams, Zoom, TAA compliant and works with all popular video calling applications such as Cisco Webex and Google Meet to ensure compatibility and seamless integration in the workplace.
C920e is designed with a sturdy, adjustable clip that makes it easy to mount on any laptop or external monitor. Plus 1/4" threads provide versatility to mount the webcam on a tripod as well.

productInformation.name: Included Components
productInformation.value: User documentation, Camera with attached 5-foot cable, Privacy shutter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect, basic webcam for WFH setups
reviews.reviewText: I got this webcam when we transitioned to work from home (WFH), and it has worked flawlessly.I got this model specifically because it didn't have a working microphone, as I have a mic in my headset an didn't want to deal with the headaches of managing a mic on the webcam too.The picture quality is fine and I don't have any criticisms of it.Also great is that it has a standard threaded hole on the bottom of the holder, so you can attach this to standard mounts and tripods.And lastly, it's awesome that it comes with a privacy cover built in, so you can easily close and open it between meetings, if privacy is important to you.Great, versatile webcam that's perfect for any WFH setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I've previously bought one for my wife and this is my second. The image quality is great and it is such a great value considering the price. It's a no brainer.Also, yes, you do have to activate the mic but it's very simple and you only have to do it once! It continues to work thereafter even with different computers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ive had it for months now and it works great!
reviews.reviewText: Great camera! Works perfect! Quality is really good. Im in Microsoft Teams meetings daily all day and it has worked great every time, even the audio works awesome on it! Would recommend 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good webcam for the price, easy to enable the microphone.
reviews.reviewText: Works great for online school work. 1080p image is noticeably better looking than another similar Logitech webcam that only had a 720p sensor. The image isn't perfect by any means, but what do you expect for a name brand webcam that's less than $60?The microphone is disabled by default (this is noted as such in the product description!) and can easily be enabled with a one time update with the Logi Tune software from Logitech. Once the microphone is enabled is stays that way even if the device is plugged into a different computer.You might ask why would Logitech sell a webcam with the microphones disabled? Some corporations and government agencies require the microphone be disabled by default for security or IT related reasons. It's very easy for the average home user to enable the mic via the Logi Tune software and once the mic is enabled the software can be uninstalled from the machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good standard webcam. Works on Linux (Ubuntu 22) with no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars La mejor cámara calidad-precio.
reviews.reviewText: La calidad es increíble, el rango visual es muy amplio y el autofocus esta muy bien.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera... does NOT actually work well with Teams.
reviews.reviewText: I have been very pleased with this camera's quality and simplicity. I primarily use zoom and the camera is perfect. I do need to point out that the camera is basically unuseable for me in Microsoft Teams (Mac user). The camera immediately has a significant lag and locks up the application. This does not occur when testing the video in the settings, but only when on a "live" call.Overall Assessment - Great Camera unless you really need it for Teams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I usually don't write reviews as many people do but just wanted to say that this product is GREAT. First, the quality of the video is so clear and vivid. Second, the size of the product is just what I wanted as I did not want a bigger size to take a lot of space on my car's windshield to block my vision. Third, the ease that this product was installed was amazing. I did not spend too much time to configure it and install the product. last but not least, this product came with a 64 GB SD memory card included which saved me some dollars Yey! My overall experience is GREAT!
